author: stu241273
title: One dimensional, but perfect for babies
review:
We were given the Musical Apple by a friend - it was amongst a large selection of used and much loved baby toys.  It really only has one key feature - press down on the head of the worm and he will then slowly rise from the apple while it plays a music box tune.


The apple is quite heavy, and weighted well at the bottom so it wobbles like a Weeble.
